title: Cape Cod National Seashore: Lodging
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Know Before You Come     Lodging              Lodging       Cape Cod National Seashore does not offer camping. Nickerson State Park is a nearby state campground and can be reached at (508) 896-3491. Cape Cod National Seashore has several cottages in Wellfleet and one in Eastham available for rent to the general public. The park currently has five properties and the leasing program is expanding. The park has two one-bedroom properties with views of the Atlantic, a two bedroom property off Ocean View Drive which is a short walk to the beach, and a newly-renovated three bedroom with views of Cape Cod Bay which is within walking distance. A fifth cottage, in Eastham, has three bedrooms and overlooks Coast Guard Beach.   You can view these properties on VRBO (Vacation Rentals By Owner) at www.vrbo.com. The VRBO numbers are 495960, 473368, 473359, 594264, and 696025. Contact information is available on VRBO.   For information about other accommodations,, including privately-owned campgrounds within the park and in surrounding towns, visit the Cape Cod Chamber of Commerce. You may contact the chamber by phone at (888) "33-CapeCod".  Information is also available at each town's information booth.
